name: feedbin
description: Feedbin is an open-source RSS reader that can be self-hosted or used as a hosted service. It provides tagging, search, filters, and a pleasant reading experience, along with APIs for third-party clients.
features: RSS Reader: Advanced feed management, Tagging and organization, Powerful search. Professional reading experience.
Filtering: Custom rules and automation. Smart content curation.
API Access: Third-party client support. Flexible integration.
Pleasant UI: Clean reading interface. Mobile-friendly design.
Self-Hosted or Cloud: Choose your deployment. Flexible hosting options.
Newsletter Support: Subscribe via email. Unified inbox.
Saved Searches: Create custom views. Personalized feeds.
Keyboard Shortcuts: Navigate efficiently. Power user features.
Dark Mode: Easy on the eyes. Comfortable reading.
Multi-Device Sync: Access everywhere. Seamless experience.
